chunks.original_latin:
NOTA LECTORIBUS: Hoc opus (Libri Carolini / Opus Caroli regis contra synodum) translatum est antequam systema textus interlinearis institueretur. Textus interactivi inspectio non adest pro hoc documento. Ad Latinum originalem et translationem Anglicam separatim videndas, quaesumus repository visitas per nexum infra datum.
https://github.com/wryan14/Latin-Patristic-Texts/tree/main/Libri_Carolini
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: NOTE TO READERS: This work (Libri Carolini / The Work of King Charles Against the Synod) was translated before the interactive text system was implemented. The interactive text viewer is unavailable for this document. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit the following repository: GitHub - Libri Carolini Repository
